articles.author: Omar Sohail
articles.title: Samsung To Release Its Own Version Of AR Glasses In Q3 2025, Research Firm Suggests New Device Will Sport A Qualcomm SoC And Will Only Weigh 50 Grams - Wccftech
articles.description: A tipster has revealed that a research firm believes that a pair of Samsung AR glasses will launch in Q3 2025 while sharing potential specifications
articles.content: A Chinese research firm estimates that Samsung will introduce its first AR glasses in the third quarter of 2025, while also providing some specifications of the upcoming device. Apparently, it will b… [+2220 chars]
